artist: Author: Sascha Scatter , et al.; Publisher: The Icarus Project , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Corner stab stitched binding, xerographic photo-collage of text, illustrations, and various photographic images printed on wove paper; 65 pp.
title: Underground Roots and Magic Spells [The Rough First Draft!]
